author: Jane C. Timm
title: No evidence for Trump's saying masks 'going out the back door' of NY hospitals
description: "It is a fundamental blunder to only prepare for today," Cuomo said after Trump wondered why a hospital needed so much equipment and supplies.
content:
President Donald Trump on Sunday questioned the rate at which a hospital in New York was using medical supplies, suggesting that theft was why the unnamed facility needed 300,000 masks a week.
How do you go from 10 to 20, to 300,000? Ten to 20,000 masks to 3… [+2959 chars]
